baseSection.baseDescription: Self-taught programmer passionate about cybersecurity, especially in web application security. Always ready to take on new challenges — the more difficult, the better.

aboutSection.description: I'm a web developer who also has experience in SEO and a solid understanding of cybersecurity. If you're looking for a specialist who can not only build an aesthetic and functional website for you but also secure it and give you guidance on SEO - contact me and allow me to take care of your project.I constantly improve my skills and stay up to date with the latest technologies and web standards. My development approach focuses on performance, accessibility, and clean code. I value communication, transparency, and long-term collaboration with clients. Whether you need a full website or just support in a specific area — I'm ready to help.

skillsSection.description: I create modern, responsive web applications with a strong focus on code readability, performance, and security. I'm proficient in both frontend and backend development, using well-established tools and technologies. I have experience working with Linux systems, application containerization (Docker), process automation, as well as SEO optimization and web application security analysis. I'm continuously developing my skills in programming and cybersecurity, allowing me to build robust, scalable, and secure solutions ready for production deployment.

certsSection.description: I am constantly expanding my knowledge as a web developer and security enthusiast. The selected courses and certifications below reflect my commitment to growth and security in the dynamic world of technology.
